description: Click-based idle game where you click on bricks to destroy them, earn currency, and purchase upgrades to progress through levels.
expectedControls: Mouse clicks on bricks and UI buttons. No keyboard controls.

inputSchema.content: Click on bricks (blue grid elements) to destroy them. Click 'UPGRADES' button to access shop. No keyboard input required.

actions.name: ClickBrick
actions.description: Click on any brick in the grid to deal damage and destroy it

actions.name: OpenUpgrades
actions.description: Open the upgrades/shop menu to purchase improvements

actions.name: OpenSettings
actions.description: Open settings menu (gear icon in top-right)

loadingIndicators.description: Level counter shows game has loaded

successIndicators.description: Currency counter is visible and updates

gridBounds.description: Center grid area as percentage of viewport where bricks are located

bounds.description: Calculate positions within brick grid area

expectedBehavior.immediateResponse: Brick shows damage animation or number decreases
expectedBehavior.progressionIndicator: Level counter may increase after clearing enough bricks

notes: Game is entirely mouse-driven - no keyboard controls needed
Primary gameplay loop: click bricks → earn money → purchase balls
QA agent should focus on rapid clicking in the brick grid area (center of screen)
Success = seeing currency increase and bricks respond to clicks
Bricks may be rendered on HTML5 Canvas, not as DOM elements
Visual validation via screenshots recommended to verify brick destruction
